name: flow-view
description: is a visual editor for Dataflow programming, powered by React

scripts.build: npm run example:render:serverside; npm run browserify && npm run minify; npm run jekyll; git status
scripts.gh-pages:_data: for x in package.json tags.json; do npm run gh-pages:_data:$x; done
scripts.gh-pages:push: git subtree --prefix gh-pages push origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages:pull: git subtree --prefix gh-pages pull origin gh-pages
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
flow: /empty.json
---" > gh-pages/index.md; cat README.md >> gh-pages/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run cp; npm run gh-pages:_data; cd gh-pages; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.jekyll:serve: npm run browserify; npm run homepage; npm run cp; cd gh-pages; jekyll serve; cd ..
scripts.lint: for x in src test; do npm run lint:$x; done
scripts.preversion: npm run build; npm run babel
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; npm run push
scripts.pull: git pull origin master && npm run gh-pages:pull
scripts.push: git push origin master && npm run gh-pages:push
scripts.start: BABEL_ENV=development NODE_PATH=src budo --open examples/basic/usage.js -- -t babelify -p livereactload
scripts.postpublish: npm run gh-pages:_data; git commit -am ':arrow_up: updated version'; npm run push
scripts.postupdate-deps: npm test && git commit -am 'updated deps' || git checkout -- package.json
scripts.test: for x in serverside components; do npm run test_$x; done
